xml: 95/e 93/k 94/t 1800 1950/i 136/y 2: "50s/6 15/farmer 4 19 0 Sam 17 13 0 Jodi 7 4 0 Kent 3 15 1/removeItem 136/removeQuest 22/pause 300/faceDirection Kent 2/Hi @. Please, come in.\/move farmer 0 -3 0/speed Jodi 4/move Jodi 0 10 2/Ah, I'm so glad you came, @! And you brought the fish! Wonderful.\/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 1/faceDirection Kent 1/faceDirection Jodi 1/Sam! Could you come in here and help clean this fish?\/pause 300/...Yes, ma'am.$a\/move Sam -5 0 3 true/proceedPosition Sam/stopAnimation farmer/doAction 12 14/move Sam 0 2 3 false/move Sam -4 0 3/faceDirection Jodi 2/pause 500/showFrame 35/addObject 7 15 136/playSound fishSlap/pause 800/stopAnimation farmer/Wow, it looks wonderful... and it smells so fresh! Thanks so much for doing this, @.#$b#Kent caught a fish, too, but he eats about a whole fish to himself!$u\/pause 200/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 1000/Heh heh.$h\/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message \"Mmm... that crispy bass was delicious! The breading was to die for...\"/pause 500/message \"I almost feel like part of the family, now.\"/pause 1500/end warpOut" #!String 94/e 93/k 95/t 1800 1950/i 136/y 1: "50s/6 15/farmer 4 19 0 Sam 17 13 0 Jodi 7 4 0/removeItem 136/removeQuest 22/speed Jodi 4/move Jodi 0 10 2/Oh hi, @! Come in! Do I smell fresh fish?\/move farmer 0 -3 1/move farmer 2 0 0/move farmer 0 -1 1/faceDirection Jodi 1/Sam! Could you come in here and help with dinner?\/pause 300/...Yes, ma'am.$a\/move Sam -5 0 3 true/proceedPosition Sam/stopAnimation farmer/doAction 12 14/move Sam 0 2 3 false/move Sam -4 0 3/faceDirection Jodi 2/pause 300/showFrame 35/addObject 7 15 136/playSound fishSlap/pause 800/stopAnimation farmer/pause 400/Wow, this looks like quality bass, @. Thanks so much for bringing this.$h\/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message \"Mmm... that crispy bass was delicious! The breading was out of this world...\"/pause 500/message \"I almost feel like part of the family, now.\"/pause 1500/end warpOut" #!String 44/f Sam 500/p Sam: "sampractice/-1000 -1000/farmer 4 15 1 Sam 17 16 2 Sebastian 18 18 0/positionOffset Sebastian 32 -31/skippable/animate Sam false true 200 20 21/showFrame Sebastian 41/viewport 17 16 true/move farmer 8 0 0/pause 500/doAction 12 14/move farmer 0 -2 1/move farmer 4 0 2/pause 9000/stopAnimation Sam/showFrame Sebastian 8/pause 1000/faceDirection Sam 0/pause 800/Oh, hi @! Sebastian and I were just having a little 'jam session'.\/move farmer 0 3 1/faceDirection Sam 3/faceDirection Sebastian 3/We're trying to start a band, but we still don't know what kind of music to make. There's too many possibilities.\/pause 500/emote Sebastian 28/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 500/emote Sam 16/faceDirection Sam 3/#$q 76 null#Say, @... what kind of music do you like?#$r 76 50 Event_band1#Cheerful pop music.#$r 77 50 Event_band2#Experimental noise rock.#$r 78 50 Event_band3#Hi-Energy dance music.#$r 79 50 Event_band4#Honky-tonky country music.\/move Sam 0 2 1/What do you say, Sebastian? Should we do this?\/pause 300/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 300/faceDirection Sebastian 3/...Okay.\/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 0/move Sam 0 -2 3/Thanks for the help, @. With my guitar skills, and Sebastian's wizardry on the synthesizer, we're gonna be a screaming success. I'm convinced of it!$h\/faceDirection Sam 2/Now I just need to find someone to play drums...$u\/pause 500/end" #!String 46/f Sam 1000/p Sam: "playful/7 4/farmer 7 12 0 Sam 7 5 0 Jodi 17 7 0/skippable/move farmer 0 -6 0/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 300/Oh, hi @. I was just about to have a snack.\/pause 500/Here, let me get something for you.\/faceDirection Sam 0/pause 500/playSound openBox/pause 500/faceDirection Sam 3/playSound dwop/specificTemporarySprite dropEgg/showFrame Sam 33/jump Sam/pause 1000/emote Sam 12/showFrame Sam 12/Oh no... What a mess.$s\/speed Jodi 4/move Jodi -10 0 0/What was that sound?\/emote Jodi 16/*gasp*$s\/move Jodi -1 0 0/move Jodi 0 -1 0/This is absolutely terrible! What happened?$u\/$q 80 null#...Tell her, @.$s#$r 80 -10 event_snack1#Sam dropped the snack as he was handing it to me.#$r 80 50 event_snack2#Sam handed me the snack and then I dropped it.#$r 81 -50 event_snack3#Sam dropped it on purpose. He thought it would be funny.\/pause 300/$p 80#Thanks for telling me the truth, @. It's not such a big deal.|You did WHAT, Sam?! What's gotten into you?!$u\/faceDirection Jodi 0/I'm sorry about this, mom. I'll clean it up.$s\/emote Jodi 20/Thanks, honey.$h\/move Jodi 0 1 1/move Jodi 1 0 2 /faceDirection Sam 2 true/move Jodi 0 7 2 true/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/$p 81#I'm angry at you. I have no idea why you lied like that.$s|Sorry about what happened earlier.\" #!String 100/f Kent 750/p Kent/p Jodi: "none/6 5/farmer 7 12 0 Jodi 5 5 0 Kent 7 16 2/skippable/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move farmer 0 -3 0/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move farmer 0 -2 0/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move farmer 0 -1 0/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move farmer 0 -1 3/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 200/faceDirection Jodi 1/Hi, @! I'm just making some popcorn.$h\/pause 50/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 79/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 100/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 26/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 39/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 50/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 110/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 59/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/AAAAAHHHHHHH!!!$u\/faceDirection Jodi 2 true/faceDirection farmer 2 true/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -1 0/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -2 0/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -1 0/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -2 0/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -1 0/speed Kent 4/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/move Kent 0 -3 0/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 50/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 100/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 80/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/That sound...$s\/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 70/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 100/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 180/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/emote Kent 12/faceDirection Kent 3/You should've known that sound would remind me of the war!$u\/pause 50/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/pause 75/playSound cowboy_monsterhit/faceDirection Jodi 0/playSound openBox/pause 400/faceDirection Jodi 2/pause 500/playMusic desolate/faceDirection Kent 2/pause 800/showFrame Kent 16/pause 800/...I lost a lot of good friends in those bloody trenches.$s\/pause 800/emote Jodi 28/pause 500/But, dear... popcorn was always your favorite before you left.$s\/pause 500/showFrame Kent 0/pause 500/pause 800/...Things have changed.\/pause 600/faceDirection Jodi 1/pause 400/move Jodi 1 0 1/*whisper* @... can you say something to him?$s\/pause 300/faceDirection farmer 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 500/faceDirection Kent 0/pause 300/$q 215 null#(Say something to Kent)$s#$r 215 -25 event_popcorn1#Jodi's to blame... she should've known better!#$r 215 50 event_popcorn2#I know you're hurting... but don't blame your wife.#$r 215 -50 event_popcorn3#(Lie) Blame me... I asked for popcorn\/pause 900/faceDirection Kent 2/pause 700/emote Kent 28/pause 600/...$s#$b#I'm sorry, honey. You couldn't have known the sound of popcorn would make me upset.\/pause 700/move Jodi 0 1 1/It's okay, dear.$s#$b#The last thing I want to do is make you upset. I'll do my best to keep your spirits up from now on.\/pause 500/faceDirection Kent 3/pause 1000/I'm glad you're a friend of the family, @. Sorry about my behavior before.\" #!String stayPut: "playMusic musicboxsong/pause 1800/move Sam 1 0 1/pause 1200/move Sam 1 0 1/positionOffset Sam 2 0/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sam 2 0/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sam 2 0/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/positionOffset Sam 2 0/positionOffset farmer -2 0/pause 50/animate farmer true true 100 101/showFrame Sam 36/pause 3000/I always knew there was something special between us...$l\/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 7000/I'm going to be thinking about this night for a long time...$l\/pause 1000/...$l\" #!String rejectSam: "pause 800/move farmer 0 3 2/faceDirection Sam 2/pause 800/showFrame Sam 37/emote Sam 28/I see...$s\/pause 800/faceDirection Sam 0/I'm sorry... I had the wrong idea. I'll see you around.$7\/move farmer 0 2 2/warp farmer -1000 -1000/playSound woodyStep/pause 1000/...$s\" #!String
